programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1797
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-Monday (M) Ep387
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience.

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Choi’s actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: Echoes of the Rainbow
programme.desc: Set in Hong Kong in the 1960s, the story revolves around the family of a hardworking shoemaker Mr Law, with his happy-go-lucky wife and two sons – a talented elder son and an eight-year-old eccentric younger son. While their lives are not always smooth-sailing, the family sticks together and support one another through thick and thin.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find “the-one”?

programme.title: Ip Man
programme.desc: Wing Chun grandmaster Ip Man’s matchless fighting skills are revered all over China. Set during the Sino-Japanese War, Ip Man is forced to leave his home and work to support his family. With only his martial arts skills, he reluctantly agrees to train others in the art of Wing Chun for self-defense.

programme.title: Horseplay
programme.desc: Ha Mui goes to London to track down an art thief, Nine-Tailed Fox, who is interested in a pottery horse from the Tang Dynasty. Cheung Ho is a cop who chases after Nine-Tailed Fox since he escaped years ago. The trio must work together to gain the pottery, with Nine-Tailed Fox being hunted by his rivals at the same time.

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: Never Too Late
programme.desc: Alex Fong and Cecilia So star as two lost souls in this romantic comedy. One has constantly been physically abused and cheated on by his girlfriend, the other was a former beer girl turned into a wandering spirit following a car accident. As the two begin to spend time together, love begins to repair their broken hearts.

programme.title: Young Ip Man: Crisis Time
programme.desc: Set in 1917, young Ip Man pursues his studies in Hong Kong. The school is held hostage on the day of an English speech competition, and as Ip Man decides to step up and fight the crisis, it is revealed that his master and his childhood friend are behind all this. Can he take them down and uphold justice?

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Liu’s family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the country’s energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: The Mask of Shura of Fire Cloud
programme.desc: 18 years ago, the evil Black Feather clan infiltrated the territory of Master Fire Cloud and stole The Mask of Shura, thus releasing an evil spirit that was a baby. Master Fire Cloud adopted the baby to prevent him from becoming evil. When the baby grows up, he takes control of the mask and becomes Fire Cloud’s successor as the city’s guard.

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Programmer and gamer Hao Ming gets approached by mercenary Fei Qiao and businessman Takeshi, and is drawn into a shady hacking game in Malaysia. The cyber mission quickly turns dangerous as Hao Ming must navigate the hidden motives and dealings of the mercenaries and figure out who's behind it all.

programme.title: Let me Eat Your Pancreas
programme.desc: A student called “I” finds the diary of his classmate, Sakura Yamauchi, and discovers that she has a pancreatic disease. The two begin to spend more time together, but Sakura eventually pass away from her illness. But Sakura had a hidden message she wanted to convey, will “I” uncover it 12 years after her death?

programme.title: A Writer's Odyssey
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name, this is the story about a father who must kill a novelist in order to find his missing daughter. Through a strange twist of fate, the fantasy world of the novel begins to impact life in the real world.

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the police’s only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene.

programme.title: I Love You, You're Perfect, Now Change!
programme.desc: Catch this comedy-musical adapted from the Broadway classic I LOVE YOU, YOU’RE PERFECT, NOW CHANGE – consisting of 12 independent stories from the viewpoints of individuals, families and societies all exploring the timeless theme of love!

programme.title: As The Light Goes Out
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve in Hong Kong, a Team of firefighters battle an out-of-control warehouse fire that threatens to plunge the entire city into darkness. The team must put their differences aside and come together for an ultimate battle to stop the fire spreading to a nearby power plant.

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963, and ruthlessly carved an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: The Rise of Hero
programme.desc: Young Wong Fei Hung studies hard for an exam in Guangzhou to win a chance to study abroad. However, Eunuch Hai plans to abort the overseas project and this conflict evolves into a real fight. Wong finally defeats Hai on his own and ensure the smooth continuation of the Study Abroad Campaign.

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Xiao Ru’s financial analysis for a bank client was stolen online. A ransom has to be paid within three days or else the document would be disclosed. To protect the client’s data, the company brings in the police to investigate. In the meantime, an analyst disappears and the Technical Director resigns. Is there a bigger crisis lurking behind?

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: Tales from the Occult
programme.desc: The movie consists of three tales about the horrors lurking in dark corners of the city. A young pop star goes back into depression when spooky things happen in her new home; an online influencer performs live in a mall, but it ends up being a livestream of his death; the residents of a tenement building battle a mysterious figure in the stairwell.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperor’s death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A Wu Dang disciple Fu, kills the chief of Wu Dang Clan and frames it on the chief’s illegitimate child, Yun. Fu then proclaims himself the new chief and orders the killing of Yun, who vows to avenge his father’s death and learns the invincible silkworm martial arts style in order to defeat Fu.

programme.title: Mr. Funnybone Strikes Again
programme.desc: In this hilarious sequel, Mr Big Potato opens an old-fashioned Chinese clinic, but his traditional methods are rejected by the sceptics of modern Hong Kong. Enter his buddy Mr Funny bone to rescue his business!

programme.title: The Tea House
programme.desc: Real-life champion martial artist Chen Kuan-Tai plays a powerful role in this memorable saga of action and romance; fighting against gangsters for his true love.

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu-lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun-yang.

programme.title: The Imperial Tomb Raiders
programme.desc: The story revolves around a maverick, a band of woman warriors and a group of ruthless bandits. The maverick teams up with the woman warriors to battle the bandits seeking to raid the emperor’s tomb.

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows.

programme.title: The Crimson Charm
programme.desc: In attempting to rescue some innocent people, swordsman Chiang Tzu-chao (Fang Mien) slays the son of Tsao Kang (Wang Hsia), leader of the ruthless Crimson Charm gang.The enraged father promises vengeance on the day of Chiang's 60th birthday...

programme.title: The Tiger And The Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: Lady Of Steel
programme.desc: A young swordswoman Fang Ying Qi sets out to join the Flying Dragon Clan in their defense against the invading Jin forces. Fang also intends to avenge the murder of her parents by bandit leader Han 20 years ago. Han has since taken on a false identity as a member of the Flying Dragon Clan and Fang must rely on her deadly sword skills to stop Han.

programme.title: Dawn Will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parent’s consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her…

programme.title: Forbidden Tales Of Two Cities
programme.desc: Li Han-hsiang wrote and directed this charming and fascinating comedy, Forbidden Tales Of Two Cities. The two cities in the picture are Macau, where a love quartet is a morally-unsound source for sexual entertainment; and Hong Kong, where a woman enters a gambler’s apartment to find four shackles hanging from his ceiling to aid in kinky activities.

programme.title: A Friend From Inner Space
programme.desc: A young boy whose parents are separated tries to find happiness in life. One day, he meets and befriends a kind-hearted spirit Ren, who decides to make him truly happy by getting his parents back together.

programme.title: The Bells Of Death
programme.desc: Wei Fu is an unremarkable woodcutter. However, when psychotic marauders killed his family and abducted his sister, he goes through vigorous martial arts training with an expert swordsman in order to exact revenge on the evildoers.

programme.title: Young Lovers
programme.desc: Guitar-playing rich kid, Yang Fan, heads to Japan to join a rock 'n' roll band where he soon finds himself competing for the affections of two beautiful girls.

programme.title: Marco Polo
programme.desc: Mongolian emperor Kublai Khan is being assassinated while meeting with the Italian explorer Marco Polo. Marco Polo is appointed to lead the troops for the emperor to wipe out the anti-Mongol rebels. Yet, he is touched by these rebels who are resisting the Mongolian invasion of their homeland. Will Marco Polo stay loyal to the emperor?

programme.title: Beyond The Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Hun’s warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: Descendant Of The Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: A young musician Chi Chiang is hired by the manager of a popular band when the group's drummer/leader Charlie, quits to join a rival group. The new drummer becomes an immediate hit, causing Charlie to be very jealous. Furthermore, the young drummer's mother is dead set against him having a music career.

programme.title: The Weird Man
programme.desc: During the Three Kingdoms period, a Taoist priest Yu Ji cures many patients with his supernatural powers and is loved by the people. However, the arrogant general Sun Che thinks that Yu Ji bewitches people and orders for him to be beheaded. Subsequently, the spirit of the Yu Ji rises from his dead body and takes revenge on Sun Che.

programme.title: The Venus' Tear Diamond
programme.desc: Legendary rival jewel thieves Fragrant Night and Nocturnal Earl travel to Japan to steal the famous Venus’ Tear Diamond. They fall quickly in love at first sight, without knowing the other person is their rival and is after the same prize. Who will get the diamond, and will it mean the end of their new found love?

programme.title: The Proud Twins
programme.desc: Jiang Xiao Yu is separated from his twin brother as a baby after his parents are murdered. He is taken by a couple to Villains Valley and raised to be a villain by a host of outlaws. Jiang leaves the valley to explore the world when he grows up - will he be able to avenge his parents and meet with his twin brother?

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keeper’s daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: The Magnificent Ruffians
programme.desc: A gang of unemployed martial artists seem to have their bad fortunes turned when the head of a local security agency hires them to take out the competition, who their new employer insists is up to no good. However, the men are being played for fools and have to take each other on until the last drop of blood is spilled.

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insider’s look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiang’s popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: The Swordmates
programme.desc: Li asks his swordmate Wang to protect his family while he is away, but Wang rapes his wife and even has his convoy attacked. Li escaped but fears his daughter is still in danger, so he asks the nephew of his master to help protect her…

programme.title: Heaven Sword And Dragon Sabre 2
programme.desc: Only by bringing together the powerful Heaven Sword and the mighty Dragon Sabre can six martial arts sects struggling for supremacy be saved in this thrilling sequel to Chu Yuan's original hit.

programme.title: The Secret Of The Dirk
programme.desc: The inhabitants of the City of Liu are forced to flee when the vicious Black Tigers gang raids their city, but are able to hide all their gold and treasures in a valley. A team of swordswomen led by Liu wants to get their hands on the treasures before the bandits, but both parties will have to contend with the wandering swordsman Chou for them...

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: The 14 Amazons
programme.desc: The Yang family had served their country in Song Dynasty for generations. When General Yang is ambushed and killed during the war in Jin Shan, the grand matriarch led the entire family to take revenge and defend the country.

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him…

programme.title: Have Sword Will Travel
programme.desc: When the head of a manor loses his kung fu skills, he enlists his nephew and his fiancé to help escort gold to the capital. The duo run into a mysterious knight along the way and they join hands to prevent bandits from stealing the gold.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: Man Of Iron
programme.desc: Chou Lian Huan (Chen Kuan Tai) is good at fist fighting in Shanghai. In order to please a hostess named Chen Ju Fang (Ching Li), he is willing to sacrifice everything and fight against the son of the gang leader in Shanghai. However, is Chou’s action worth it?

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: Danger Has Two Faces
programme.desc: Many years ago, Inspector Kam killed an innocent man and decided to resign from the police force. He became a professional killer who disguises as a pet store owner. When his best friend, Bobby begins investigating recent murder cases committed by Kam, he discovers that the mastermind behind these cases is actually his superintendent.

programme.desc: A wunderkind boss who, in an effort to ensure his staff's connectedness and productivity, asks them all to virtually interact and work face-to-face all day.

programme.title: Jo Koy: LIghts Out (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Jo Koy's star continues to rise in his second feature-length, uncensored stand-up special, Lights Out.

programme.title: Saturday Night Live (S48) Ep15
programme.desc: Live from New York, its Saturday Night Live!

programme.title: The Good Wife (S1) Ep14
programme.desc: Hi - Alicia defends a man accused of killing his child's babysitter. Meanwhile, Peter's appeal seems to be going well, and Alicia prepares for the idea of his returning to her life.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show (S3) Ep4
programme.desc: It's an all-new Cookbook Club with 'Half Baked Harvest' author Tieghan Gerard who is whipping up Finish Spicy Shrimp Tacos.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show (S3) Ep5
programme.desc: Actress Selma Blair opens up to Drew in an in-depth sit-down about writing her memoir, 'Mean Baby', in which she details her alcohol abuse and long undiagnosed battle with multiple sclerosis.

programme.title: Wonder Park
programme.desc: Buckle up for a fun-tastic family adventure where anything is possible! Future inventor June discovers her dream amusement park is real.

programme.title: Same Kind of Different as Me
programme.desc: An ex-con drifter develops an unlikely friendship with a wealthy Dallas art dealer.

programme.desc: Celebrity Interior Designer Mikel Welchis helping upcycle a vintage armoire into a dream coffee nook. Plus, In A Minute Drew tries out the famed Big Shot amusement ride in Las Vegas.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S4) Ep6
programme.desc: I Want to Be Him - Beth confronts her fathers house guest. Kayce and his family search for a new home. Jamie needs answers from Garrett. Lloyd loses his cool.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: When a kingpin threatens New York City, a news reporter find a quad of mutants which makes an alliance to unravel Shredder's plan as the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles.

programme.title: This is Stand-Up
programme.desc: This Is Stand-Up documentary pulls back the curtain on this cherished, but perhaps little understood art-form.

programme.title: The Daily Show (S28) Ep70
programme.desc: The Daily Show correspondents tackle the biggest stories in news, politics and pop culture.

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: Pete and Ellie must learn the ropes of instant parenthood when they bring in three foster children. Inspired by a true story, discover this must see family comedy from the creators of Daddy's Home.

programme.title: HERSTORY: Judge Judy (S23) Ep6
programme.desc: When three unsupervised children annoy a roommate, an alleged assault takes place and a restraining order comes into play.

programme.title: HERSTORY: The Drew Barrymore Show (S3) Ep6
programme.desc: Celebrity Interior Designer Mikel Welchis helping upcycle a vintage armoire into a dream coffee nook. Plus, In A Minute Drew tries out the famed Big Shot amusement ride in Las Vegas.

programme.title: How To Lose a Guy in 10 Days
programme.desc: Andie Anderson, agrees to write a firsthand account of all the things women do to drive away men, she has to find a guy, make him fall in love with her, then get dumped all in 10 days.

programme.title: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra
programme.desc: After a high-tech, secret weapon is stolen by the mysterious and evil Cobra organization, the G.I. Joes must race against time to stop Cobra from using the weapon and plunging the world into chaos.

programme.title: Welcome At Esposito's
programme.desc: Tonino Esposito is the worst mafia boss that ever walked the earth, but when he finds out that his daughter is dating the son of a public attorney, he finally gets the chance to prove his worth to the family and the whole city of Naples.

programme.title: Murders in Lille
programme.desc: A sculptor is found dead inside one of his own sculptures on exhibition. Detective Caroline works with a childhood friend, who is also the exhibition’s designer, to crack the case. But little does she know, the suspect is closer than she’ll ever imagine.

programme.title: Macondo
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Chechen boy Ramasan grows up in Macondo, a refugee settlement on the outskirts of Vienna. Living alone with his mother and two little sisters, Ramasan takes over the role of the father assuming the responsibility for his small family.

programme.title: Parents Home Alone: The Winters
programme.desc: The Winters family undergoes an upheaval when Marie, the daughter, relocates to Berlin. Tanja plans on divorcing Matthias, leaving him with a wounded pride. He fights to save his marriage but fails, until he rediscovers a new perspective in life.

programme.title: The Lottery Seer
programme.desc: As one of the few literate people in his Indonesian village in the 1980s, 5 year old Herman aspires to be a famous reader. However, his rare ability in the village leaves him open to exploitation.

programme.title: Needle Park Baby
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Michelle Halbneer, “Needle Park Baby” recounts the unbelievable story of an eleven-year-old girl and a childhood growing up with heroin addicted parents set in Platzspitzpark, Zurich’s public drug scene in the nineties.

programme.title: A Little Lesson In Love
programme.desc: Taking shelter from a storm inside a cafe, Julie finds a stack of math papers left behind and a troubling love letter. It seems that a teenager had written it for her teacher, and it is up to Julie to prevent the student from doing anything stupid.

programme.title: Girl in Flight
programme.desc: 11-year-old Silvia decides to fulfill her dream of visiting Rome by running away from home. She befriends Emina, a Roma girl, on the train ride there, and embarks on an adventure with her through the city to her gypsy camp.

programme.title: Romancing The Jungle
programme.desc: Eva is a rookie journalist keen on investigating sea piracy. When she is really kidnapped by pirates in Thailand, she is forced to fight for her life. With her is a hunky smuggler called Nik, and together, the comedic duo band together to survive.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Mermaid
programme.desc: Two detectives investigate the death of a mermaid, Sybille Baumgartner, who was found beaten to death on the shore of Lake Constance. They suspect the killer was Matteo, a kite-surfer who left the crime scene with a knife in his abdomen.

programme.title: Welcome At Esposito's

programme.desc: In an abandoned villa, three children witness a fierce fight between Jakob Stocking and a building contractor. Jakob kills him but returns later with his lawyer to turn himself in. As questions pile up, two detectives uncover a long-kept family secret.

programme.title: A Little Lesson In Love

programme.title: The Bride In Red
programme.desc: In a bid to scam their guests off their gifts of cash, Roberta and Leòn enlist the help of Roberta’s non-conformist aunt to stage a fake wedding . However, they need to navigate the obstacle that is Roberta’s eccentric family for the scheme to work.

programme.title: Girl in Flight
programme.desc: 11-year-old Silvia decides to fulfill her dream of visiting Rome by running away from home. She befriends Emina, a Roma girl, on the train ride there, and embarks on an adventure with her through the city to her gypsy camp.

programme.title: Roxanne
programme.desc: Twenty years after the Romanian Revolution, Tavi finds out from his secret police file that he might have a son he had not known about. In his search for the truth, Tavi gets caught up in his complicated past which threatens to mess up his current life.

programme.title: Road to Your Heart
programme.desc: In this sweet road-trip movie, Basson, a young businessman journeys to Cape Town for his father’s funeral and to fulfill certain tasks in the will. He meets bohemian Amory along the way and they encounter hilarious moments, disappointments and heartaches.

programme.title: The Sound Of Trees
programme.desc: 17-year-old Jérémie dreams of a life away from his family’s sawmill and forestry work. He much prefers pimping his car, hip hop and slacking off with friends - much to his father’s despair. When his brother leaves town, their lives change drastically.

programme.title: Paper Roof
programme.desc: A heart-warming insight of life through adolescent eyes – two young sisters run away from a dysfunctional home, with nothing but one another and a shared dream to live together in a cardboard house.

programme.title: Cracks In Concrete
programme.desc: Ertan leaves jail after 10 years and tries to settle back in society. Mikail spends his time with parties, drugs and dreaming of a life as a gangster rapper. Ertan looks for Mikail. Mikail doesn't know Ertan. Soon they must face a harsh reality.

programme.title: A Thousand Times Good Night
programme.desc: Rebecca is one of the world's top war photographers. She must weather a major emotional storm when her husband and young daughters refuse to put up with her dangerous life any longer. They need Rebecca, who, however, loves both her family and her work.

programme.title: The Sound Of Trees
programme.desc: 17-year-old Jérémie dreams of a life away from his family’s sawmill and forestry work. He much prefers pimping his car, hip hop and slacking off with friends - much to his father’s despair. When his brother leaves town, their lives change drastically.

programme.title: You Can't Tame A Rockstar
programme.desc: For true love, John Winter, a popular rock star, decides to forgo sex and drugs for a new ‘vanilla’ lifestyle. Worried about his image, John’s manager orders his assistant Lou to make John wild again. But the mission goes awry when Lou falls for John.

programme.title: Paper Roof
programme.desc: A heart-warming insight of life through adolescent eyes – two young sisters run away from a dysfunctional home, with nothing but one another and a shared dream to live together in a cardboard house.

programme.title: On The Edge
programme.desc: Based on a true story, Raevskiy is a successful but arrogant film director. He has money, women, and fame. However, when a family tragedy occurs, his world comes crashing. Alone and helpless, he embarks on a journey of self-destruction and reflection.

programme.title: A Thousand Times Good Night
programme.desc: Rebecca is one of the world's top war photographers. She must weather a major emotional storm when her husband and young daughters refuse to put up with her dangerous life any longer. They need Rebecca, who, however, loves both her family and her work.

programme.title: Thirst
programme.desc: On a hilltop in Bulgaria plagued by drought, a couple and their teenage son eke out a living doing laundry for local hotels. The arrival of a well-digger and his daughter promises not only to quench their thirst for water, but for something far stronger.

programme.title: The Devil Inside
programme.desc: Catherine is the head of a parole agency, a wife and a mother. When a 20-years-old charismatic inmate is released on parole, she finds herself ensnared in a sordid affair with him. Their unbridled passion unleashes dangerous consequences for both.

programme.title: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Yusuf’s best friend, Memo falls gravely ill. Isolated in their boarding school located in the snowy mountains, tensions run high as Yusuf’s calls for help for Memo becomes increasingly difficult in the face of an authoritarian and bureaucratic system.

programme.title: Cardboard House
programme.desc: Homelessness in Singapore is easy to miss. But once the lights are dimmed and the bustle quietens, they live in plain sight. From family problems to financial issues, the pains of the homeless are complex – but that shouldn’t stop us from seeing them.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 6
programme.desc: The guys pose as crabby NYC cab drivers, then head to the park to solicit undeserved congratulations. And in the special travel punishment, the big loser plays sheriff in an old Nevada town full of outlaws.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 17
programme.desc: After a terrible date, Raj vows to never leave his apartment again. Meanwhile, Penny actually impresses Sheldon with her acting skills.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 18
programme.desc: Leonard, Sheldon and Howard try to advance the cause of women in science by speaking with junior high girls about their future careers, while Raj plans his date with Lucy.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 19
programme.desc: When Howard finds a letter from his father, he's forced to confront his past, struggling with whether or not he should open it. And Leonard and Penny throw a grown-up cocktail party at the apartment.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 20
programme.desc: Let the battle begin! Leonard, Sheldon and Raj fight for tenure at the University – and the competition heats up when the girls get involved!

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 21
programme.desc: After one of his favorite TV shows gets canceled too soon, Sheldon feels lost, so Amy tries to help him get over his compulsive need for closure by retraining his brain.

programme.title: Stargirl S3 4
programme.desc: After Sylvester’s plan results in an unexpected outcome, Pat calls an old friend for help. Beth uncovers a new suspect in their murder investigation.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 8
programme.desc: In one of the most unusual big money auctions yet, Sean auctions the contents of abandoned big-rigs. Scott and Jesse go head to head over a space age haul, while Brandon and Lori take a chance on a battle-ready rig. Meanwhile, Papa Bear goes all in for some vintage fun stuff - and he isn't in the mood to play games.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 9
programme.desc: It's wheels up for Papa Bear when he takes a gamble on a mysterious covered item. Meanwhile, the newcomer Alvarado brothers find an unusual collectible hiding in plain sight -- but are they going to flush their money down the toilet? And Brandon andLori find out whether a pet bin will turn out to be their best friend.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 10
programme.desc: Does Big Bear mean Big Money? The Alvarados get sneaky while Desert Dan horses around, and frustration gets the best of Brandori. Do they strike gold or strike out? As Jesse crushes dreams, who will go home empty-handed?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 11
programme.desc: Brandon goes out on a limb, and finds himself sinking in quicksand with no help from Lori - will Desert Dan lend him a hand? Dan's car smarts come in handy, while T Money rocks out with his win. Will Scott and Chrissy climb to the top, or fall hard in today's auction?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 12
programme.desc: Scott blows his wad on an Oktoberfest bin, and will have to drown his sorrows. The Alvarado Brothers bid big on collectibles -- will they draw a wild card? T Money rides away with a big win, while Brandon and Lori investigate a crime scene bin. Willeveryone make it out of the auction alive?

programme.title: Grudge Match
programme.desc: Oscar® winner Robert De Niro (Raging Bull, Silver Linings Playbook) and Oscar® nominee Sylvester Stallone (the Rocky films, The Expendables) play Billy “The Kid” McDonnen and Henry “Razor” Sharp, two local Pittsburgh fighters whose fierce rivalry put them in the national spotlight. Each had scored a victory against the other during their heyday, but in 1983, on the eve of their decisive third match, Razor suddenly announced his retirement, refusing to explain why but effectively delivering a knock-out punch to both their careers. Thirty years later, boxing promoter Dante Slate Jr., seeing big dollar signs, makes them an offer they can’t refuse: to re-enter the ring and settle the score once and for all.

programme.desc: Arman’s fallout with Hayak (NAVID NEGAHBAN) has severe consequences for Thony, who must now find her way back home from Mexico with Luca.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 5
programme.desc: The guys try to dig themselves out of a jam by asking strangers to help bury bizarre items, then compete to see who can cling the longest to a stranger's car. And the big loser makes a room full of enemies at an auction house.

programme.title: Aquaman (2018)
programme.desc: Once home to the most advanced civilization on Earth, the city of Atlantis is now an underwater kingdom ruled by the power-hungry King Orm. With a vast army at his disposal, Orm plans to conquer the remaining oceanic people -- and then the surface world. Standing in his way is Aquaman, Orm's half-human, half-Atlantean brother and true heir to the throne. With help from royal counselor Vulko, Aquaman must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan and embrace his destiny as protector of the deep.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S3 2
programme.desc: Superman & Lois S3 2

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 21
programme.desc: After one of his favorite TV shows gets canceled too soon, Sheldon feels lost, so Amy tries to help him get over his compulsive need for closure by retraining his brain.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 2
programme.desc: The guys pose as employees at a copy center, conduct bizarre exit interviews for moviegoers, and then lead some very peculiar protests. Later, it's Unhappy Hour for the big loser, as he cuts off paying customers at a party.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 3
programme.desc: The guys conduct focus groups to sell their illogical inventions created by the other guys, then head to a shoe store where they get off on the wrong foot. And the big loser discovers he's more flight than fight at the zoo.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 4
programme.desc: The guys play a game of copycat at the park while babysitting kids. Then, they hit the supermarket for an epic battle of catch and release, and the loser learns that creeping around the gym is more uncomfortable than working out.

programme.title: Supergirl S6 4
programme.desc: Supergirl discovers a way to escape from the Phantom Zone, but it comes with some dangerous strings attached. Meanwhile, Lena joins the team on a mission, but has second thoughts.

programme.title: Supergirl S6 5
programme.desc: Nia and Brainy attempt to save Supergirl from the Phantom Zone by time traveling back to Kara's home in 2009. Brainy is worried about keeping a low profile so as not to alter the future timeline.

programme.title: Supergirl S6 6
programme.desc: In the second part of the flashback episodes, Young Kara experiences Kyrptonite for the first time, while Nia and Brainy are trapped by invading aliens.

programme.title: Supergirl S6 7
programme.desc: As the Super Friends brave the Phantom Zone to bring Supergirl home, each member of the team is confronted by visions of their worst fear.

programme.title: Supergirl S6 8
programme.desc: In the Midseason premiere, Supergirl and Zor-El (JASON BEHR) make their return to National City, determined to keep the Phantom Zone behind them.

programme.desc: Shaw meets her match in a 10-year-old girl whose aptitude for surveillance could be the very reason why her number has come up.

programme.desc: Kelly and Kara investigate prison abuse when a young, orphaned alien boy fears there’s something wrong with his incarcerated brother. And Nyxly crashes one of Nia’s dreams.

programme.title: Grudge Match
programme.desc: Oscar® winner Robert De Niro (Raging Bull, Silver Linings Playbook) and Oscar® nominee Sylvester Stallone (the Rocky films, The Expendables) play Billy “The Kid” McDonnen and Henry “Razor” Sharp, two local Pittsburgh fighters whose fierce rivalry put them in the national spotlight. Each had scored a victory against the other during their heyday, but in 1983, on the eve of their decisive third match, Razor suddenly announced his retirement, refusing to explain why but effectively delivering a knock-out punch to both their careers. Thirty years later, boxing promoter Dante Slate Jr., seeing big dollar signs, makes them an offer they can’t refuse: to re-enter the ring and settle the score once and for all.

programme.title: Kate Humble's Coastal Britain (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Exmoor - Kate enjoys an 11-mile walk in Exmoor along the South West Coast Path, regarded as one of the most beautiful coastal paths in the world. Starting at Porlock Weir, Kate heads to St Bueno's, a tiny parish church that seats just 33 worshippers - and which holds a dark past. She then heads inland to see the valley that inspired RD Blackmore's 1869 novel of outlaws and revenge, Lorna Doone.

programme.title: Simon Reeve's South America (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Simon travels from the vast white salt flats of Bolivia, through the world's greatest wetlands of Brazil's Pantanal and on to the forested heart of Paraguay.

programme.title: Kate Humble's Coastal Britain (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Exmoor - Kate enjoys an 11-mile walk in Exmoor along the South West Coast Path, regarded as one of the most beautiful coastal paths in the world. Starting at Porlock Weir, Kate heads to St Bueno's, a tiny parish church that seats just 33 worshippers - and which holds a dark past. She then heads inland to see the valley that inspired RD Blackmore's 1869 novel of outlaws and revenge, Lorna Doone.

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Frenchness - Griff Rhys Jones continues his journey across Canada, heading to Quebec and Montreal to experience the French Canadian way of life, which includes sampling poutine, Maple syrup and the obsession with ice hockey.

programme.title: Frozen Planet II (S2) Ep2
programme.desc: Frozen Ocean - At the top of our planet lies the Arctic Ocean - a shape-shifting world of ice and water, home to unique animals like polar bears, harp seals and bowhead whales.

programme.title: Animals with Cameras (S2) Ep2
programme.desc: Australia - Wildlife cameraman, Gordon Buchanan leads a team using specially designed on board cameras to film ground-breaking new behaviour in some of Australia's most iconic creatures.

programme.title: Life Below Zero (S10) Ep6
programme.desc: Into the Freeze - Alaskans seek out vital resources amid a deep freeze in the heart of Dark Winter, pushing through temperatures well below zero.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: The Commander - Volcano expert Chris Horsley is called back to the Congo to investigate a potentially lethal threat to over two-million people. After a recent eruption, a huge 10-mile-long fracture has appeared in the ground. It runs directly from the slopes of Nyiragongo volcano down to lake Kivu. Chris has come to explore why this has happened and what the consequences could be.

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall (S2) Ep4
programme.desc: Gabon - Steve Backshall and his team travel to Gabon, to help the government to try and establish an area of land and home for wildlife as a UNESCO World Heritage site.

programme.title: Inside the Factory (S6) Ep9
programme.desc: Ice Cream - Gregg Wallace, Cherry Healey and Ruth Goodman look at Britain's history with ice cream, and see it produced on an epic scale.

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Frenchness - Griff Rhys Jones continues his journey across Canada, heading to Quebec and Montreal to experience the French Canadian way of life, which includes sampling poutine, Maple syrup and the obsession with ice hockey.

programme.title: Extreme Treks (S3) Ep7
programme.desc: Jordan - The Wadi Rum Desert - With its mountains rising up out of the sand, any journey through the Wadi Rum will leave you feeling you've traveled to another world. Join Ryan as he explores Amman and makes the arduous trek through the unforgiving Wadi Rum Desert.

programme.title: Inside the Factory (S6) Ep10
programme.desc: Tortilla chips - Gregg Wallace visits the biggest tortilla factory in Europe, while Cherry Healey takes on the hottest chilli in the world and Ruth Goodman reveals how the Elizabethans treated their ruff collars.

programme.title: Wild Metropolis (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Residents - Cities may seem unlikely havens for wildlife, but for animals able to adapt, the urban world is filled with opportunity. This first episode examines what it takes for wild animals to thrive in the fastest changing habitat on the planet.

programme.title: Simon Reeve's South America (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Simon travels from Chile's Atacama Desert and follows the Andes mountains to Patagonia before ending up in the most southerly permanently inhabited region on earth, Tierra del Fuego.

programme.title: Life Below Zero (S10) Ep7
programme.desc: Burdens of Winter - As the Arctic summer turns to fall and temperatures begin their decline, Alaskan ingenuity assists in securing materials for the coming freeze. To prepare for the winter ahead, bush-dwellers brave dangerous encounters with hungry predators.

programme.title: Robson Green Grand Slam Fishing (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Michigan - Bass is big in America, so Robson is heading to Michigan for the coveted Bass Grand Slam. He's on one of the best bass fishing lakes in America, but is it enough to secure the prize?

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: A veteran pair of osprey return home to a Connecticut saltmarsh. Over one summer they must battle their enemies, withstand the elements, and hunt hundreds and hundreds of fish, all to raise the next generation of sea raptors.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Frida the Jaguar Cub Ep1
programme.desc: Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, who’s honing her survival skills in Brazil’s Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Lola the Sea Lion Pup Ep2
programme.desc: Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean Ep5
programme.desc: Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Australian Spring Fever Ep6
programme.desc: Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Interior Ep3
programme.desc: Some of the most interesting adaptations in the animal world are completely invisible. Study these hidden, internal alterations to see how different animals have evolved to survive in amazing and unseen ways.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 - And So it Begins… Ep1
programme.desc: Head to the heart of Central Kalimantan, Borneo - home to one of the most unique schools in the world. There are 68 students in all, including class clown Valentino (who loves a short-cut) and class couple Darril and Liti (who have their first fight).

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 - Movin’ on Up Ep2
programme.desc: Best buds Valentino, Madara and Utris are ready for the next stage of forest school. Baby Clarita is at long last reunited with her mother. And toddler Mema discovers a tasty treat inside a rotten log (it can happen!).

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: A veteran pair of osprey return home to a Connecticut saltmarsh. Over one summer they must battle their enemies, withstand the elements, and hunt hundreds and hundreds of fish, all to raise the next generation of sea raptors.

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved over millions of years to survive on the continent.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Frida the Jaguar Cub Ep1
programme.desc: Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, who’s honing her survival skills in Brazil’s Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Lola the Sea Lion Pup Ep2
programme.desc: Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Australian Spring Fever Ep6
programme.desc: Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Monkey Island 1 - Leaving Home Ep2
programme.desc: An ancient citadel once home to Sri Lanka’s kings has now been reclaimed by the jungle… and there’s a new dynasty in power. Monkeys.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Eyes Ep4
programme.desc: Why do zebras have stripes? How do penguins see underwater? And why are a tree frog’s eyes red? In this exploration of sight, discover how some animals have evolved to see extremely well while others have evolved to be nearly invisible.

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved over millions of years to survive on the continent.

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: A veteran pair of osprey return home to a Connecticut saltmarsh. Over one summer they must battle their enemies, withstand the elements, and hunt hundreds and hundreds of fish, all to raise the next generation of sea raptors.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Frida the Jaguar Cub Ep1
programme.desc: Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, who’s honing her survival skills in Brazil’s Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Lola the Sea Lion Pup Ep2
programme.desc: Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean Ep5
programme.desc: Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Australian Spring Fever Ep6
programme.desc: Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Social Animals Ep5
programme.desc: Cooperation comes in many forms. Some animals cooperate to be social while others put the welfare of the group above their own reproductive potential. See the many ways species have evolved to work with one another in order to survive.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Ancient Lineages Ep6
programme.desc: Some call them “living fossils”, but that's just another way to say survivors. From the shark to the horseshoe crab, these animals' early adaptations were a success, leaving them relatively unchanged for millions of years.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 - A Whole New World Ep5
programme.desc: Now that albino orangutan Alba’s here, how will her classmates react? Plus, take a tour of the nursery school, see how Beni deals with a big bully, and watch as a few feisty females find their place in a new hierarchy.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 - Weighs and Means Ep6
programme.desc: Beni faces his weigh-in while Alba is back in isolation. Pujon reclaims his position as gang leader. A team heads out to rescue an infant orangutan. And an unwelcome visitor prompts the staff to introduce a cautionary lesson in snake awareness.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 - Handle with Care Ep7
programme.desc: Rescued orphan Josh needs his broken wrist examined, and Beni visits the dentist to treat his bad breath. Having overcome her typhoid infection, Alba is reunited with her old friends, but receives a frosty reception.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 - Teens, Tots and Tantrums Ep8
programme.desc: It’s a first at forest school. Inside the clinic, the team meets a mysterious new creature. It turns out to be a sun bear - the tiniest of all bears! Find out how Denny Bear fares in these new surroundings.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: How the Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: There is an endless variety of sleep-strategies among animals, yet it seems a universal behavior. But why bother with sleep at all? How do animals cope without sleep or the dangers of being unconscious in the wild? Just some of the baffling questions that lead through How the Wild Things Sleep.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Punks on the Run Ep3
programme.desc: The lions of the Nomad pride rampage deep into the heart of the MK pride’s territory, scattering its members and coming dangerously close to the five new MK cubs. Meanwhile, the Hollywoods are recovering, and Ava’s survival skills are still intact.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Punks Strike Back Ep4
programme.desc: After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Hollywoods Held Hostage Ep5
programme.desc: During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Next Dynasty Ep6
programme.desc: The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Social Animals Ep5
programme.desc: Cooperation comes in many forms. Some animals cooperate to be social while others put the welfare of the group above their own reproductive potential. See the many ways species have evolved to work with one another in order to survive.

programme.desc: The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Monkey Island 1 - Trouble in Paradise Ep3
programme.desc: Relaxing among the ancient temples of Sri Lanka, tufted grey langurs share their territory with a troop of toque macaques and a group of purple face leaf monkeys. This is primate paradise. But a crippling drought changes everything. The three species are forced to adapt and take risks.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Ancient Lineages Ep6
programme.desc: Some call them “living fossils”, but that's just another way to say survivors. From the shark to the horseshoe crab, these animals' early adaptations were a success, leaving them relatively unchanged for millions of years.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Next Dynasty Ep6
programme.desc: The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Isle Royale Ep1
programme.desc: Since the 1900s, this uninhabited island in Lake Superior has been a constant battleground between moose and wolves. Scientists have been watching closely since 1953, making it one of the oldest research projects in the country. We go with lead researcher Rolf Peterson as he gets a band of volunteers to scour the island for moose bones, trying to piece together population numbers after a long winter.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Invaders from the Deep Ep2
programme.desc: As far as invasive species go, Asian carp are some of the nastiest invaders around. They've thus far made their way up America's waterways, snaking up the Illinois river, eating voraciously, breeding quickly, and decimating native fish populations and their food supplies.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - The Blue Lagoon Ep5
programme.desc: Nestled on the western coast of South Africa lies an extraordinary cove that is host to an abundance of marine and bird life. It provides ample food and spurs a life cycle that reaches well beyond Africa. This is the Blue Lagoon.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 - Migration Ep6
programme.desc: Epic flights, adventurous sea journeys and exhausting road trips all play a key part in the lives of many species. These empires travel in search of food, shelter or a mate. But booking and organizing travel is no easy feat when those plans involve hundreds – even thousands – of individuals.

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: A veteran pair of osprey return home to a Connecticut saltmarsh. Over one summer they must battle their enemies, withstand the elements, and hunt hundreds and hundreds of fish, all to raise the next generation of sea raptors.

programme.title: How the Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: There is an endless variety of sleep-strategies among animals, yet it seems a universal behavior. But why bother with sleep at all? How do animals cope without sleep or the dangers of being unconscious in the wild? Just some of the baffling questions that lead through How the Wild Things Sleep.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spiky and Stinky Ep3
programme.desc: Check out vet Phil’s clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinic’s favorite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew who’s the catch of the day.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spoonbill Soft Shoe Shuffle Ep4
programme.desc: Join the team’s scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey who’s having seizures. Scale a tree with rescuer Jo to net a wounded lizard, see kookaburra feather-implant surgery, and admire a spoonbill’s new corrective shoes.

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: A veteran pair of osprey return home to a Connecticut saltmarsh. Over one summer they must battle their enemies, withstand the elements, and hunt hundreds and hundreds of fish, all to raise the next generation of sea raptors.

How do animals cope without sleep or the dangers of being unconscious in the wild? Just some of the baffling questions that lead through How the Wild Things Sleep.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Leaping Into Life Ep1
programme.desc: It’s spring, and the farm is bursting with new life. Watch a ewe give birth to twins, an orphaned Hereford calf struggle to find a surrogate mother, and the top hen nestle down in her maternity coop.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Great Escape Ep2
programme.desc: Experience life on the farm as things heat up for summer. Watch animals swelter in a rare heatwave, try to stay cool in the nearby freshwater stream, and stash supplies for fall.

programme.desc: Dream House Nightmare - A family once thought tales of their Washington home's haunted past were just rumors -- until they all had ghostly encounters.

programme.title: Paranormal Lockdown S3 Ep1

programme.title: Hometown Horror S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Satanic Swamp - Freetown, MA, sits next a vast forest associated with unexplained events, bizarre accidents, and satanic cults.

programme.title: Haunting In The Heartland S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Face Of Evil - Steve travels to Hebron, Kentucky, to investigate an evil entity attacking a local woman in her home. As he and his team get closer to answers, spirit becomes violent.

programme.desc: Alarmed And Dangerous - The Spirit Hunters head to Houston, TX, to help a woman being terrorized by an aggressive male entity.

programme.title: The Osbournes Want To Believe S2 Ep19
programme.desc: Sympathy For The Devil - Jack shines light on the Illuminati with evidence that's in plain sight.

programme.title: Ghost Nation S1 Ep7

programme.title: Ghosts Of Morgan City S1 Ep1

programme.title: Haunted Towns S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Wraith Revenge - The TWC head to Wyoming to investigate a former frontier town infamous for the botched hanging of one of its most notorious criminals.

programme.title: Mysteries At The Museum S13 Ep5

programme.desc: Space Mall - Team Voltron travels to an intergalactic mall to purchase lenses needed to power the TeleDav

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep20

programme.desc: Boy Boy Girl Band / Lords And Lazers - Tip and Oh try sneaking into a concert but almost destroy Human-Boov relations forever; K-Trong invites Tip and Oh to a make-believe game weekend.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep24
programme.desc: Dome Sweet Dome / My Pet Clamsquatch - Chet accidentally trades all of the town's tomatoes to the devious Ace Gecko and the FAST crew has to outsmart the lizard in order to get them back. // Skidmark has been secretly keeping a clamsquatch as a pet and it's up to the crew to protect the creature from a nefarious secret organization.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep24
programme.desc: Slide - Half dinosaur! Half construction truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep24
programme.desc: Mad About Madagascar - The Wanderers travel to Madagascar to get fresh vanilla for Wizard Flambė. Odlulu is already there; using the Bouncy-Bounce Key to build an ice cream parlor up in a Baobab tree! Before Odlulu gives up the key, Woof playfully takes it and starts a game of game of catch-me-if-you-can. They must catch Woof before the entire island of Madagascar is turned into a bouncy house.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep2
programme.desc: Colossal Strawberry/The Sappening - When Berry sees a "giant strawberry," she's convinced that the prophecy of the berry colossus has com e true and that she's been chosen to lead her people to their true calling. Rocksy, meanwhile, is devastated that her friend is leaving, unti she realizes the strawberry is actually a pinata and Berry is in danger! / Twig is afraid his sapping will put the Mighty Ones in peril, but Rocksy aims to show him that his sap can be used for good.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep24
programme.desc: Sphere - A piece of treasure that belongs to the Mole King is missing, and he won't give it up unless Puss helps him reunite with his ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep24
programme.desc: Are You There Frank? It's Me, King Julien - Frank the Sky God comes to the lemur kingdom to prove his existence – and to demand the ultimate sacrifice: King Julien himself.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep25
programme.desc: The Tide Is Nigh / Rain Gran - Eep takes up death-guarding at the watering hole, but finds out it's more mundane than she thought. Valley believes her. Thunk tries to overcome his fear of thunderstorms.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep24
programme.desc: Breakers / A Day Without Tech - To save their family vacation, the Tucci's must “out-party” the hard-partying Breakers; When Boov-tech stops working, Oh goes off the grid.

programme.desc: Smidgician / DJ's Got Talent - Smidge tries to rescue the Trolls after thinking she has magical powers/ DJ Suki tries to impress her favorite niece CJ Suki
