programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Detective Baby Shark - When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Lemonade - Tiny Chef makes pink lemonade and has to convince Ruby that trying new things can be fun!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep523
programme.desc: Pups Save a Frozen Camp-out / Pups Save the Fizzy Pickles - Alex and Mr. Porter are on a tropical Island camping trip when a freak snowstorm hits! // Mr. Porter is delivering his famous fizzy pickles to people around town when a bumpy road shakes up the deliveries and causes the pickle jars to POP.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Paddington Celebrates Mrs Birds Day - It's Mrs. Bird Day & Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it - how will he show his appreciation?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep149
programme.desc: Shopping - Peppa and her family go to the grocery store for some tomatoes, spaghetti, onions and fruit, but Daddy Pig gets some chocolate cake for the kids.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep150
programme.desc: My Birthday Party - It is Peppa's birthday, and Peppa has a party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep151
programme.desc: Daddy's Movie Camera - Daddy gets a new video camera. First, Peppa shows him how to work it, and then he records Peppa being silly.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep167
programme.desc: The Greedy Gobbler - While Bubu and Christopher want to enjoy an hazelnut snack, their hazelnuts go missing! When Anna, Froga and Ron's chocolate snack also disappears, the friends are convinced it's the work of the GREEDY GOBBLER and the HAZELNUT PRANKSTERS.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep168
programme.desc: A Longchair for Ron - A sleeping spider squats Ron's swing, and he can't take a nap. He laments to Anna and Froga that he wishes he had a deck chair to sleep on. This gives them the idea to surprise him with one.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Into the Blueniverse - It's an interstellar Blue's Clues adventure! Magenta's toy spaceship spins out of control, disappearing into Blueniverse. Where in the Blueniverse is Magenta's spaceship? We'll play Blue's Clues to find out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep813
programme.desc: Pups Save a Show Jumper / Pups Save the Salmon - Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog to enter in a frog-jumping contest and ends up needing rescued in a swamp. // The pups must help salmon get to the ocean and also need to rescue Alex who gets stuck on top of a dam.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep907
programme.desc: Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art - When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Sky Art / The Great Race - Sir Steel is upset with Lola's sky art as it affects the popularity of his hat stand, so he tries to disperse her artwork. // The Deer Squad have a race to see whose cart is the fastest, but Sir Steel unexpectedly join in with his Steelmobile!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Were wig on the the loose / Lights Camera Action - When Sir Steel's high-tech wig malfunctions and goes on the rampage in Platinum City the Deer Squad race to the rescue. // The Deer Squad must think fast to save Lady Fluffpot when Sir Steel's filming turns into a Disaster Movie!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Paddington's Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Taste of Italy - Jonathan & Paddington find a treasure map in a bottle on the lake! Judy & Toq also find a treasure map, but who will find the treasure first? // Mr. Gruber has always wanted to go to Italy & Paddington sets about helping his friend achieve his dream!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Lemonade - Tiny Chef makes pink lemonade and has to convince Ruby that trying new things can be fun!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep422
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Frozen Flounder / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Narwhal - Cap'n Turbot's boat gets frozen in the Arctic Ice. // The pups use the Sea Patroller to help guide a lost narwhal back home.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep506
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save the Flying Diving Bell / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Soggy Farm - Francois and Turbot discover an underwater volcano is going to erupt while Farmer Yumi and Mayor Goodway are unknowingly scuba diving nearby. This is a mission for the Sea Patrol! // Farmer Al's farm is flooded! The PAW Patrol needs to rescue him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep513
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save Tilly Turbot / Pups Save an Upset Elephant - The Paw Patrol must rescue Cap'n Turbot and Francois' Grandma Tilly after she rides off on a Dolphin. // Carlos and Tracker calls the Paw Patrol to help solve the mystery of a rumbling sound that's upsetting the Jungle elephants.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep806
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Water Walker / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Windsurfer - Mayor Humdinger swipes Francois' water-walking shoes and ends up trapped in a pit-like turtle nest. // A long lost letter inspires Ms. Marjorie to visit an old surfing buddy. The pups spring into action when a nearby volcano erupts.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Sea Patrol 3 - Pups Save a Shark - In hopes to have the whole beach to himself - Humdinger makes a robotic shark to scare everyone away.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep914
programme.desc: Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle - When an unhappy Merpup tries to float Puplantis to the surface, it's up to the Paw Patrol and their newest member Coral (Skye's long-lost merpup cousin) to save the city and stop him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep152
programme.desc: School Play - Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Polly's Holiday - Granny and Grandpa’s pet, Polly Parrot comes to stay. Peppa and George love Polly Parrot. She is very funny and repeats everything anyone says. When Polly flies away, no one knows how to get her back, until George comes up with a very clever plan.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Windy Autumn Day - It is a cold and windy day. At the park, all the leaves have turned red and yellow. It is so windy that Peppa’s ball blows into the pond and George’s hat blows into a tree.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Mysteries - The family is watching “Detective Potato” on TV. Peppa and George want to be detectives too. So,Daddy Pig gives them a mystery to solve. Teddy is hidden and Peppa and George use a magnifying glass to follow a trail of cake crumbs to solve the mystery

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep415
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard - Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Shake, Rattle and Bang - Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Champion Daddy Pig - Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep111
programme.desc: When I Grow Up - A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Barba TV / The Museum - The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Tow Truck Tough! - Blaze transforms into a tow-truck - and, with the help of AJ and Gabby, sets off on a tow-tally awesome adventure to save Stripes.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep111
programme.desc: CAKE-tastrophe! - When a hungry Crusher accidentally turns the baker truck’s baker bots to messy mode, they sprout wheels and drive away! It’s up to AJ and Blaze to track down all the rampaging robots before Axle City is blanketed in baked goods.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep814
programme.desc: Pups Vs. Ouchy Paws / Pups Save a Glow-in-the-Dark Party - Sid Swashbuckle pretends to be a legendary ghost so that he can take Danny's new skateboard. // Ryder and the Pups race to save Mayor Goodway's Glow-in-the-Dark Party guests when a frightened Alien Boy zaps them into floating space bubbles.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep816
programme.desc: Pups Stop a Super Shaker / Pups Save a Flying Farmhouse - Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire and shakes up Adventure Bay, even threatening to rock the Lookout off its foundation. // Farmer Al has a wild dream that the Paw Patrol must rescue he and Yumi when his animals start acting like humans.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Tiny Heroes/Big Face in Space - When the younger animals in the forest want to be like their heroes Deer Squad, things don't go as planned as Sir Steel steps in. // The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Deer Ball - Things get competitive when Sir Steel takes on the Deer Squad for the Deer Ball Cup - but who's bending the rules?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Paddington Visits the Doctor / Paddington and the Sleep Over - Paddington hurts his knee & goes to see Dr Yasmin. When she steps out, he steps UP and is mistaken for a doctor. // Can Mr. Brown's sleepover live up to Mrs. Brown's high standard when Simi and Toq come to stay for the night?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep806
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Water Walker / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Windsurfer - Mayor Humdinger swipes Francois' water-walking shoes and ends up trapped in a pit-like turtle nest. // A long lost letter inspires Ms. Marjorie to visit an old surfing buddy. The pups spring into action when a nearby volcano erupts.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep509
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save the Pirated Sea Patroller - The ferris wheel has been stolen by Sid the Pirate and Arrby. The pups set out to bring it back to Adventure Bay! However, Sid comes up with an even more sneaky plan: to steal the Sea Patroller!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep426
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save Puplantis - Sid Swashbuckle the Pirate and his first pup mate Arrby steal the giant pearl-making shell that gives Puplantis its magic.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep503
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save the Sunken Sloop / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Wiggly Whale - Sid the Pirate and his First Mate Arrby have taken the sunken sloop! A wiggling whale has knocked the diving bell upside down. // It's stuck in the sand at the bottom of the ocean, with Cap'n Turbot and Francois inside!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Sea Patrol 4 - Pups Save the Pier - The pier could fall into the water due to a broken support post.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep914
programme.desc: Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle - When an unhappy Merpup tries to float Puplantis to the surface, it's up to the Paw Patrol and their newest member Coral (Skye's long-lost merpup cousin) to save the city and stop him.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Bonnie's Mom - Santi and crew must team up with Bonnie to rescue her mom, pirate Billie Bones, from her sneaky first mate!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Busy Baby - Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Detective Baby Shark - When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Paddington Celebrates Mrs Birds Day - It's Mrs. Bird Day & Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it - how will he show his appreciation?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Teddy's Day Out - Peppa and her family are having a picnic. Mr Zebra the Postman and Zoë Zebra are having a picnic too, so they decide to have one big picnic. When it’s home time, Peppa leaves her teddy behind.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Emily Elephant - There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep210
programme.desc: George's Friend - George and Rebecca Rabbit's little brother Richard each have a toy dinosaur but they are not very good at sharing their toys. Mummy Pig shows them that they can have much more fun at the playground if they play together, just like their big sisters.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep171
programme.desc: Bubu's New Blue Jeans - Christopher has prepared his annual obstacle race and is excited for all the friends to participate. Bubu's new blue jeans are still drying so he has to wear his brand-new pair to the event, he becomes overly concerned of getting them dirty.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep172
programme.desc: Everywhere at Once - Anna has prepared her ice cream for everyone but forgets to place it in the freezer. - as she is trying to help all her friends at once, the ice cream melts! Is it ruined or can it be saved?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Let Justice Be done / The Great Spring Clean - Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep319
programme.desc: Blue's Treasure of Clue Lagoon - Come on a beach adventure to Rainbow Cove with Blue, Josh and Rainbow Puppy! According to legend, there's a fantastic hidden treasure, and Rainbow Puppy wants Josh and Blue's help finding it

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep993
programme.desc: Paw Patrol: Jet to the Rescue - The Duke of Flappington takes the Princess' gem and uses its magical powers to raise Barkingburg into the sky! Skye will need to overcome her biggest fears and lead the team in their biggest aerial rescue yet! Get ready to JET TO THE RESCUE!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Raining teddies / Party people - Jade's first sleepover is an eventful occasion when Stu & Safia make it rain teddies across the city and Central Forest! // Sir Steel is put out when he discovers he's not been invited to Lady Fluffpot's party but the Deer Squad are.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep226
programme.desc: Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens / Paddington Helps a Hedgehog - Paddington & the Kids overhear Mr. Brown talking about selling the house! Will they really have to leave Windsor Gardens? // The kids are playing in the garden & make a prickly discovery. Something is not right so Paddington asks Baaz to help.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep224
programme.desc: Paddington's Pet Hotel - Paddington opens Windsor Gardens' first ever pet hotel when he has Lucky to stay over.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Pancakes - Tiny Chef makes pancakes but loses his confidence when he breaks his special lucky pancake flipping spatula.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep806
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Water Walker / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Windsurfer - Mayor Humdinger swipes Francois' water-walking shoes and ends up trapped in a pit-like turtle nest. // A long lost letter inspires Ms. Marjorie to visit an old surfing buddy. The pups spring into action when a nearby volcano erupts.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep509
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save the Pirated Sea Patroller - The ferris wheel has been stolen by Sid the Pirate and Arrby. The pups set out to bring it back to Adventure Bay! However, Sid comes up with an even more sneaky plan: to steal the Sea Patroller!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep426
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save Puplantis - Sid Swashbuckle the Pirate and his first pup mate Arrby steal the giant pearl-making shell that gives Puplantis its magic.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep503
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save the Sunken Sloop / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Wiggly Whale - Sid the Pirate and his First Mate Arrby have taken the sunken sloop! A wiggling whale has knocked the diving bell upside down. // It's stuck in the sand at the bottom of the ocean, with Cap'n Turbot and Francois inside!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Sea Patrol 4 - Pups Save the Pier - The pier could fall into the water due to a broken support post.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep914
programme.desc: Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle - When an unhappy Merpup tries to float Puplantis to the surface, it's up to the Paw Patrol and their newest member Coral (Skye's long-lost merpup cousin) to save the city and stop him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Recycling - Peppa and George help Mummy Pig tidy up the breakfast things. Mummy Pig tells them that bottles go into a special green box to be recycled. Old newspapers go in a red box and tins go in a blue box. Peppa and George have fun filling the boxes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Daddy Pig's Office - Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pig’s office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbit’s job is all about numbers, Mrs Cat‘s job is all about drawing shapes on the computer, and Daddy Pig’s job is complicated.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Pirate Island - Grandpa and Granny Pig are taking Peppa, George and their friends to Pirate Island. Grandpa shows how to use his metal detector to find treasures and they all build a big sandcastle.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Jumble Sale - Peppa’s playgroup is holding a jumble sale to raise money for a new roof and Madame Gazelle asks everyone to bring something to sell. Peppa and her friends bring in an old toy but they soon realise that favourite toys can be hard to let go of.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Chatterbox - Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep419
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Van - When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Three clocks are much better than one. Mr Fox has everything in his van – even a chicken!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep420
programme.desc: Chloe's Big Friends - Peppa and George go to play with Cousin Chloe and her friends, but the older children don't want to play any "baby" games.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Grass is Always Greener... - Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Barbazoo Can't Say ''No'' / The Doppelganger - Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Falcon Quest - In the sky above Animal Island, a remarkable race is about to begin. But before Blaze can join, he must spread his wings! Challenged by a tough-talking falcon, Blaze takes off on a journey to earn his place with the fast fliers!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep112
programme.desc: The Mystery Bandit - When a mysterious bandit makes off with Blaze’s metallic trophy, he must track down the culprit in this preschool whodunit!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep817
programme.desc: Pups Save a Box Fort / Pups Save Travelin' Travis From Really Big Bill! - The Pups must save Rocky and Humdinger from a runaway box fort. // When Skye helps Traveling Travis search for Big Bill Island, the misguided explorer gets carried away by a really, really big bird.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep821
programme.desc: Dancing with Luke Stars! / Pups Save a Mischievous Octopus - A dance contest being judged by Luke Stars goes wrong when a floating dancefloor carries the contestants away. // The pups investigate a mystery at an undersea-themed museum exhibit and discover an octopus that wants to return to the ocean

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Treasure Park/Baddy Long Legs - When Bobbi and Jade find an underground cavern, they end up in danger when Sir Steel goes treasure hunting! // Rammy is so focused on meditation that he fails to focus on a REAL crisis!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep212
programme.desc: The Big Bug Hunt - Lady Fluffpot hates mini-beasts - and Sir Steel creates MEGA-beasts that the Deer squad must deal with.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep222
programme.desc: Paddington's Radio Show / Paddington's Butler - Mr. Curry's & Paddington's favorite radio show is cancelled - how will they ever know the ending now? // Mr. Curry ends up being Paddington's butler for the day - but he's better giving orders than taking them.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep422
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Frozen Flounder / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Narwhal - Cap'n Turbot's boat gets frozen in the Arctic Ice. // The pups use the Sea Patroller to help guide a lost narwhal back home.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep506
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save the Flying Diving Bell / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Soggy Farm - Francois and Turbot discover an underwater volcano is going to erupt while Farmer Yumi and Mayor Goodway are unknowingly scuba diving nearby. This is a mission for the Sea Patrol! // Farmer Al's farm is flooded! The PAW Patrol needs to rescue him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep513
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save Tilly Turbot / Pups Save an Upset Elephant - The Paw Patrol must rescue Cap'n Turbot and Francois' Grandma Tilly after she rides off on a Dolphin. // Carlos and Tracker calls the Paw Patrol to help solve the mystery of a rumbling sound that's upsetting the Jungle elephants.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep806
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Water Walker / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Windsurfer - Mayor Humdinger swipes Francois' water-walking shoes and ends up trapped in a pit-like turtle nest. // A long lost letter inspires Ms. Marjorie to visit an old surfing buddy. The pups spring into action when a nearby volcano erupts.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Sea Patrol 3 - Pups Save a Shark - In hopes to have the whole beach to himself - Humdinger makes a robotic shark to scare everyone away.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep914
programme.desc: Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle - When an unhappy Merpup tries to float Puplantis to the surface, it's up to the Paw Patrol and their newest member Coral (Skye's long-lost merpup cousin) to save the city and stop him.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Kiko's Song - When the coquís of Isla Encanto stop singing, Santi and crew travel into the rainforest to find out the mystery behind their silence.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Coach Grandma - Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep211
programme.desc: The Boat Pond - Peppa and her family and friends are playing at the pond with their toy boats. Everyone has a boat to play with except Rebecca Rabbit. Daddy Pig makes Rebecca a boat out of newspaper. Rebecca’s paper boat is so nice; everyone wants one.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Mr Scarecrow - The birds keep eating the seeds from Grandpa Pig's flower garden. Peppa and George make a scarecrow, which stops the birds from eating. But Peppa is worried that the birds are hungry, so Granny Pig gives the birdies a birdfeeder with their own seeds.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep213
programme.desc: The Time Capsule - Peppa and her school friends are making a time capsule. They each put one of their favourite things inside and bury it in the school garden. The children discover that their parents made a time capsule many years ago.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep173
programme.desc: The Blue Butterfly - Anna and her friends are on a mission to capture a photograph of a pretty flower, but on the search, they see a beautiful blue butterfly. The friends finally discover the best way to capture their enchanting photo.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep174
programme.desc: Achoo ! - Bubu teaches Christopher about allergies. And when he witnesses Anna sneezing uncontrollably when she is around Froga, he is convinced that she is allergic to her! They wonder if they will ever be able to live life as they once did!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep319
programme.desc: Blue's Treasure of Clue Lagoon - Come on a beach adventure to Rainbow Cove with Blue, Josh and Rainbow Puppy! According to legend, there's a fantastic hidden treasure, and Rainbow Puppy wants Josh and Blue's help finding it

programme.desc: The Walking Badge - The Squirrels learn the many ways you can walk with the help of friends and a catchy song.

programme.desc: Norrie's First Day - Norrie skips into the Clubhouse and greets her friends. As they greet her, they reminisce about when they first met.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep32
programme.desc: The Grand Canyon, USA - Kyan is completing his 'GoJet Academy' high-wire training, above the Grand Canyon, but he's not the only wire-walker out there...

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep33
programme.desc: Easter Island, Chile - Grandmaster Glitch is on holiday to the remote Easter Island to avoid crowds, but when he arrives he finds droves of tourists everywhere!

programme.title: Kit and Pup (S1) Ep13
programme.desc: Wet and Dry - Kit and Pup are at the beach. Can you see who is wet and who is dry? Kit and Pup are also helping a little investigator find out whether wet or dry sand is best for building a sand castle.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S2) Ep19
programme.desc: Flower - Dee encourages a friend to say 'flower' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see a pink flower, a yellow flower, a frilly flower and silly squirty flowers too!

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep77
programme.desc: Sleepybyes - The Teletubbies say goodnight to the Tiddlytubbies; it is sleepybyes time. But Po isn't tired anymore and goes for a special ride on her scooter.

programme.title: Clangers (S2) Ep24
programme.desc: The Other Iron Chicken - The Iron Chicken goes off on a trip to see the Wols. Tiny is missing her so the Soup Dragon comes up with a way to cheer Tiny up - she will pretend to be the Iron Chicken!

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep14
programme.desc: The Thing That Wanted To Fly - Gwen tells a baby bird she will teach it how to fly. The only problem is that she doesn't know how to herself!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep77
programme.desc: All Out Cook Out - Bo's uncle cooks outdoors to make their evening meal.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep78
programme.desc: Pipe Down! - Jo's Dad can't fit his truck through a tunnel. Can Team Tinpo help?

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Dino Saurus Games - Whilst playing animal races in the backyard, Jeanie tells Monty that all dinosaurs were slow, leading Monty and Jimmy Jones to imagine traveling back millions of years to see if they can find a fast dinosaur.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Tiny Little Me - When Monty and Jimmy Jones discover that Jeanie is having trouble writing lyrics for her song, they suggest they all spend some time in the backyard looking for inspiration, and imagine what the garden would look like if they were shrunk down to the size

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Cosmic Clean Up - When Stan and Violet ask Monty to tidy his room, they suggest he turn it into a game to make it more fun, but Monty begins to question whether it's possible to turn a task like tidying into a game.

programme.desc: I Really Absolutely Must Have Glasses - Lola is going to have her eyes tested at the optician's, but she's not at all keen. What will happen if she has to wear glasses?

programme.desc: Chilli to the Rescue - Chilli decides to become a superhero called Super Chilli! His superhero skills are put to the test when Evil Pea covers Supertato in sticky honey. Chilli's heat saves the day.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep4
programme.desc: The Spot the Difference Badge - Duggee looks different, but what is it? By playing some looking games, the Squirrels learn how best to spot the difference.

programme.desc: The Parthenon, Greece - Inspired by his favourite action film, Grand Master Glitch plans to make a blockbuster of his own, but first he needs to find the right setting for an action adventure.

programme.desc: Showcasing the achievements and inspiring stories of Pacific athletes in Australia and around the world. Host Tiana Penitani will be joined by athletes with Pacific heritage including Sam Wykes, Sera Naiqama and Tyson Pedro.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep10
programme.desc: Beverley O'Connor presents the week's main international news, as reported by ABC News correspondents deployed in Bangkok, Beirut, Istanbul, Jakarta, Jerusalem, London, New Delhi, Port Moresby, Taipei, Tokyo and Washington.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep8
programme.desc: The economy is slowing, interest rates have risen ten times, inflation remains high and the cost of living is biting: it's never been more important to keep an eye on your money. Rachel Pupazzoni looks at the week in finance.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep8
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: Landline Ep7
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: News Breakfast: Early Ep61
programme.desc: Be the first to know the latest as Michael Rowland and Lisa Millar bring you up to date on overnight developments and all the news you need to know this morning. Plus Emma Rebellato with sport and Nate Byrne with weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep61
programme.desc: When big stories break, turn to Joe O'Brien in the mornings to bring you what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep61
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gardening Australia S34 Ep6
programme.desc: Inspiring, entertaining and full of practical advice, join Costa Georgiadis and the team as they unearth gardening ideas, meet avid gardeners and look at some of the most inspiring gardens from across the country.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia S9 Ep2
programme.desc: David and Jenny have a dream to live in a super-modern terrace house in a traditional suburb. But their daring plan to create a three-storey home really pushes stress levels and finances to the limit.

programme.title: How Deadly S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Koalas are loud angry lovers, but are they dangerous? Nature nerd Dr Ann Jones reveals the secrets of Australia's cuddliest critters.

programme.title: Landline Ep7
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep41
programme.desc: The daily destination for #auspol addicts. Greg Jennett comes to you from Parliament House with the latest news in politics and national affairs, plus interviews with key players on the issues and events making headlines.

programme.title: ABC News Hour Ep61
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you comprehensive coverage from our reporters on the ground telling you what's happening and why it matters. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: The Drum Ep46
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's daily lives, encouraging thoughtful, challenging debate with a diverse panel led by Ellen Fanning, Dan Bourchier, Julia Baird and John Barron.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep61
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Karina Carvalho.

programme.title: 7.3 Ep45
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep61
programme.desc: More news, more often - the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. Our network of reporters uncover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Karina Carvalho.

programme.desc: The multiple award-winning show that has been running since 1992, will bring you more reports from around the globe, highlighting a variety of issues faced by different countries and spotlighting ways we can learn from them.

programme.desc: Australia's leading forum for public debate, Q+A returns to ABC TV's unbeatable Monday news and current affairs line-up. Host Stan Grant and thought leaders from home and abroad bring unique perspectives to your questions.

programme.title: Mediterranean Journey Crete Greece
programme.desc: Locals call it the "Island of the Gods” because as legend would have it, Zeus was born here.Crete is the largest Greek island. It offers stunning stretches of coastline, beautiful port towns like Ágios Nikólaos, as well as picturesque mountainscapes. After Spain and Italy, Greece is the world’s third largest producer of olive oil. Crete is also suffering the impact of climate change and the resulting aridity. That’s why researchers are trying to find ways to support local farmers. Community plays a key role in Greek culture, and dance is an important aspect of national identity.

programme.desc: The chefs of Otowasan Kannonji Temple show us how to make cucumber tsukudani. Season cucumbers, then boil as quickly as possible to maintain crunchy texture.

programme.desc: Caught in an evening shower, Edo townspeople scramble across a bridge in search of shelter. On the river beyond, a lone figure steers his boat, unfazed by the rain. What is his destination?

programme.desc: Sato Kodai is an up-and-coming creator who produces works that appeal to children and adults. He uses cutting-edge technology to create heartwarming stories with a nostalgic feel.

programme.title: Darwin'S Amazing Animals
programme.desc: A jungle in Tokyo? It may come as a surprise that deer, weasels and badgers live right alongside humans near the Tama River. Grasslands, woods and sand bars make up the capital's very own Tamazon!

programme.title: Trails To Oishii Tokyo Mini
programme.desc: Salt has been a valued commodity in Japan for centuries used for cooking and even purification. Experience an ancient sea salt extraction process and savor some equally unique Japanese delights.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: NHK Documentary
programme.desc: After neuroscientist Onzo Ayako's mother was diagnosed with Alzheimer's, she began to track her mother's behavior and physical changes in her brain, hoping to better understand the disease's impact.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Four Seasons In Japan
programme.desc: Yamagata's Tobishima Island in the Sea of Japan features flocks of birds resting their wings or raising their young while peregrine falcons hunt from the cliffs above to feed their nesting chicks.

programme.title: Nun'S Cookbook
programme.desc: The chefs of Otowasan Kannonji Temple show us how to make zucchini au gratin. Slice zucchini in half and hollow out. Fill with cream cheese and mayonnaise for a stylish, summery treat.

programme.title: Ukiyoe Edo-Life: Sudden Shower
programme.desc: Caught in an evening shower, Edo townspeople scramble across a bridge in search of shelter. On the river beyond, a lone figure steers his boat, unfazed by the rain. What is his destination?

programme.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from March 25, Day 14 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Osaka.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Sound Trip
programme.desc: We explore a magical ritual festival in the hidden village, Joujouka/Morocco with Immersive Audio sound technology. Discover and experience the healing power of the Joujouka music.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Spiritual Explorers
programme.desc: Explore the spirituality of kumidaiko, an ensemble of Japanese taiko drums featuring intricate and thunderous beats with dynamic choreography.

programme.title: Framing Everyday Moments
programme.desc: A unique time-lapse photography project. Shot by pros and non-pros from around the world, on the transience of nature, celestial phenomena, cityscapes and each single moment of everyday life.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: Gifts are exchanged in the traditional betrothal rite. Paper cords are twisted into intricate shapes and decorate gifts.

programme.title: Origami Magic
programme.desc: Origami is magic made from a single sheet of paper. We introduce two artists who create origami "miniatures." And our origami expert, "Dr. Origami," will teach you how to make an easy origami craft.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Face To Face

programme.title: No Art, No Life Plus
programme.desc: Outsider artists like Araki Keiji are gaining recognition around the world. Although he creates mainly for himself, others have taken notice. See how these artists live and work.

programme.title: Dining With The Chef Mini
programme.desc: Learn about Japanese home cooking with Master Chef Saito, based on traditional Japanese cooking techniques in five minutes! Featured recipe: Lamb Niku-jaga.

programme.desc: This is a new program intorducing various programs and activities of NHK World-Japan. As the first episode, we show "Japan Railway Journal" presenting the attractiveness of local railways in Japan.

programme.title: Education,The Door To The Future

programme.title: My Street Piano

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2302
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: Shark Grand Prix de France Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - Built in 1965 around the existing 24-Hour track, the Le Mans Bugatti Grand Prix race circuit lies 5km south of the city of Le Mans and 200km south-west of Paris. The venue has hosted Grand Prix since the late sixties but a serious accident to Spanish rider Alberto Puig in 1995 saw it struck off the calendar until 2000 whilst stringent safety improvements were carried out. Le Mans is a tight track dominated by first gear corners that place the emphasis on late braking and hard acceleration, whilst rear end traction is also a key area. With the capacity to comfortably accommodate up to 100,000 spectators, the Bugatti circuit also plays host to the 24 hour truck race, the FIA GP2 Championship, French Touring Car and GT races.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2302
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC 286: Edwards vs. Usman 3
programme.desc: Prelims - One of the welterweight division’s longest standing rivalries comes to a close in the main event of UFC 286 at the O2 Arena in London when England’s own Leon Edwards defends his crown against former champion Kamaru Usman in a rubber match the entire sports world will be watching. Fresh from a stunning knockout of Usman last August that evened their series at 1-1, Birmingham’s Edwards will now make his first title defense against “The Nigerian Nightmare,” who has won 19 of his last 20 bouts. Plus, two of the lightweight division’s most explosive contenders collide, as Justin Gaethje meets Rafael Fiziev in the UFC 286 co-main event

programme.title: UFC 286: Edwards vs. Usman 3

programme.title: UFC The Walk Ep403UsmanvsBurns
programme.desc: In 2021, UFC Welterweight Champion Kamaru Usman took on former teammate and friend Gilbert Burns. Get an in-depth look at both athletes’ journeys to the Octagon and relive Usman’s performance as he cements his place in UFC history.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Vera vs. Sandhagen
programme.desc: Prelims - In the UFC’s toughest division, every fight is a must win, and Top 5 bantamweight contenders Marlon Vera and Cory Sandhagen know that to get into the title conversation, a win in their UFC Fight Night main event at the AT&T Center in San Antonio on March 25 is essential to their championship hopes. Riding a four-fight winning streak that includes knockouts of UFC legends Frankie Edgar and Dominick Cruz, Vera is on the fast track to the top, but to get there, he must defeat Colorado’s Sandhagen, a versatile battler coming off a stoppage of Song Yadong to end 2022
